column7: 1. When operating new equipment for the first time I prefer to_Have a go and learn by 'trial and error'
column8: 2. When seeking travel directions I_Ask for spoken directions
column9: 3. When cooking a new dish I_Call a friend for explaination
column10: 4. To teach someone something I_Explain verbally
column11: 5. I tend to say_I know how you feel
column12: 6. I tend to say_Let me try
column13: 7. I tend to say_Listen to me explain
column14: 8. Complaining about faulty goods I tend to_Go back to the store, or send the faulty item to the head office
column15: 9. I prefer these leisure activities_Museums or galleries
column16: 10. When shopping generally I tend to_Look and decide
column17: 11. Choosing a holiday I_Listen to recommendations
column18: 12. Choosing a new car I_Read the reviews
column19: 13. Learning a new skill_I talk through with the teacher exactly what I am supposed to do
column20: 14. Choosing from a restaurant menu_I imagine what the food will look like
column21: 15. When listening to a band_I sing along to the lyrics (in my head or out loud)
column22: 16. When concentrating I_Move around a lot, fiddle with pens and pencils and touch unrelated things
column23: 17. I remember things best by_Writing notes or keeping printed details
column24: 18. My first memory is of_Looking at something
column25: 19. When anxious I_Visualize the worst case scenarios
column26: 20. I feel especially connected to others because of_What they say to me
column27: 21. When I revise for an exam, I_I talk over my notes, to myself or to other people
column28: 22. When explaining something to someone, I tend to_Show them what I mean
column29: 23. My main interests are_Photography or watching films or people watching
column30: 24. Most of my free time is spent_Watching television
column31: 25. When I first contact a new person_I talk to them on the telephone
column32: 26. I first notice how people_Look and dress
column33: 27. If I am very angry_I keep replaying in my mind what it is that has upset me
column34: 28. I find it easiest to remember_Faces
column35: 29. I think I can tell someone is lying because_The vibes I get from them
column36: 30. When I'm meeting with an old friend_I say "it's great to hear your voice!"
